sentence.text: Although the 4 PKPs displayed different levels and patterns of subcellular distribution in tumors, there was a positive correlation between immunoreactivity for desmosome assembly and PKP3, as well as for PKP2 and p0071, suggesting possible functional similarities associated with differentiation, tumor growth, and disease prognosis.
In contrast, strong desmosome assembly immunoreactivity was observed in 85.7% of metastatic tumors.
